title: Gifting skins post game, when will this feature be brought back?
body: I like to gift random skins to my teammates or opponents post game, but for the last maybe two months this feature has been unavailable. I like to think I'm restoring peoples faith in humanity if only just a bit. Sometimes i gift skins to a toxic teammate in an attempt to warm their icy heart, other times its to my jungler who carried when i fed first blood, either way the saying is true it is better to give then to receive.

replies.body: I'm looking forward to this feature coming back myself! I don't have details right now on when that feature will be back, but I'll stay on the lookout and try to forward that info your way!
